name: Hipmob
long_description:
Hipmob brings easy to use live chat, helpdesk, feedback and customer engagement tools to mobile and tablet businesses. Whether you're a mobile-native startup, a small business going mobile, or a large public company with a growing mobile business, we give you the tools to increase sales, transform customer support, and make your customers happy. 

With real time contextual information about your customers including device, app, OS, geographic info and more, you'll be able to make take actions that improve your bottomline. Our partnerships and integrations (see more at www.hipmob.com/documentation) mean that we'll fit right into your team's habits.

AND, we're insanely responsive to customer feedback - email us with questions at ayo@hipmob.com!
one_liner: Customer communication for iOS and Android developers - an in-app…

name: TalkBin
long_description: Acquired by Google, integrated natively into Google Maps.
one_liner: Consumer to business messaging.

name: Olark
long_description:
Olark is easy-to-use live chat software that lets you talk to customers on your website. 

Olark can help you track leads, drive sales, increase conversions, and provide great customer service. Real-time visitor information like login name, geographic location, purchase history and cart contents help you personalize every interaction and strengthen customer relationships. 

Sign up and start making your customers happier today!

Click here to sign up for a demo:
https://hello.olark.com/sales
one_liner: The best live chat software on the planet.  We help you build…

name: Netomi
long_description:
Welcome to Netomi AI, where we are revolutionizing the world of customer experiences through cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Our mission is clear: to create AI that not only solves mission-critical problems for the world's largest brands but also fosters genuine customer love. Backed by industry titans like Y-Combinator, Index Ventures, Jeffrey Katzenberg, and Greg Brockman, Netomi AI is at the forefront of defining the future of AI-driven customer engagement.

At Netomi, we embody our core values in everything we do:

Passion: We love what we do, genuinely. We persevere, creatively problem solve, and grow from adversity.

Customer Focus: We obsess over creating a positive impact and deliver experiences that meet or exceed the needs of our customers, and their customers.

One Team: We believe in working collaboratively as One Team to meet shared objectives and goals.

Joining Netomi AI means being part of a dynamic, fast-growing team that values innovation, creativity, and hard work. As a key player in the Generative AI revolution, you'll have the opportunity to significantly impact our success while developing your skills and career in the ever-evolving field of AI.

Netomi AI is not just a workplace; it's a community of visionaries shaping the future of customer engagement. If you're ready to be part of something extraordinary, where your passion aligns with our values and vision, we invite you to explore opportunities with us. Your journey to redefine customer experiences with brand-safe AI starts here.

Mission
To empower the highest quality customer experiences with brand-safe AI.

Vision
Building Brand and Customer Love
one_liner: Self-Driving Customer Care

name: HiOperator
long_description: HiOperator provides customer support as a service. Banish your ticket backlog and free up your in-house team for higher level tasks.
one_liner: Customer support as a service.

name: Bicycle AI
long_description: At Bicycle AI we use the best of machine intelligence with human supervision to provide an exceptional customer service experience.
one_liner: Bicycle AI provides customer support as a service. We work on top of…

name: Sixty
long_description:
Sixty is the fastest way to get on demand web app help. Hire an expert by-the-minute to jump on a screenshare for help with your web design, development, software implementations, and more.

Starting at $1/min.
one_liner: On demand web app help

name: Percept.AI
long_description: Artificial intelligence for modernized customer support. We provide end-to-end AI-powered solutions for business to connect with and support their customers. By leveraging the state of art deep learning and natural language processing technology, we make the customer support teams more intelligent and efficient.
one_liner: AI support agent for your business that actually works

name: Observe.AI
long_description:
Observe.AI, a leader in Contact Center AI, transforms customer experiences and improves agent performance by helping top brands analyze 100% of calls and streamline quality assurance workflows. With Observe.AI, businesses transcribe every call with high accuracy and coach agents while gaining full visibility into their customer service operations. Observe.AI brings the power of agent assistance, automatic speech recognition, and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to modern contact centers and their frontline teams.
Observe.AI is trusted by more than 150 customers and partners, including Root Insurance, Alcon Laboratories, Tripadvisor, and Pearson. Backed by Menlo Ventures, Next47, NGP Capital, Scale Ventures, Nexus Ventures, Emergent Ventures, Steadview Capital, 01 Ventures and Y-Combinator, Observe.AI’s headquarters is in San Francisco with an office in Bangalore, India. For more information, visit www.observe.ai.
one_liner: Contact center AI platform.

name: OutRival, Inc.
long_description: OutRival empowers customer experience teams to create and deploy Conversational AI Agents that leverage existing resources, cut costs, and grow revenue. Starting with Admissions Teams in Higher Education.
one_liner: AI Agents for Admissions Teams in Higher Education

name: cloud humans
long_description:
cloud humans introduces claudIA, every startup's CX super agent.

ClaudIA is a GPT based bot who can answer any customer support tickets with zero tech effort and already integrated with your current flows and systems. 

With ClaudIA, you can automate 55-90% of your customer's enquiries while maintaining the same service level you are proud of. Gain efficiency, scalability and quality today.

Try it free (demo): https://www.cloudhumans.com/us/claudia-demo
Reach out if you have any questions: bruno@cloudhumans.com
one_liner: AI-powered customer service for startups

name: Chatwoot
long_description: Chatwoot is an AI-powered customer support platform that enables businesses to deliver exceptional support experiences. Built as a modern, open-source, and self-hosted alternative to tools like Intercom and Zendesk, Chatwoot brings all your customer conversations into one place. You can connect email, website live chat, social media accounts, WhatsApp, and more, making it easy to manage every interaction from a single, unified platform.
one_liner: The modern, open source, self-hosted AI customer support platform

name: Atlas
long_description:
Atlas is a modern, all-in-one customer support platform that is built with AI first. We help you solve your customers problems faster by understanding them more completely with a suite of customer tools like session recording, bug tracking, and event feeds. You can think of us as the next generation Zendesk / Intercom combined with Log Rocket and Linear.

Learn More: https://atlas.so/

Products:
- Chat Widget
- Ticketing
- Omni channel Support (chat, email, WhatsApp, Slack Connect, and SMS)
- Customer Timeline
- Session Recording
- Help Center
- AI Chatbot
- Customer Insights
one_liner: Modern customer support platform replacement for Intercom and Zendesk

name: Nara
long_description: We make it easy for small and medium businesses to build an AI sales agents for their websites and social media, augmenting their sales capacity. This assistant provides personalized shopping recommendations to customers and is available 24/7 to answer their questions.
one_liner: Answer 70% of your support and sales questions. Instantly

name: Frigade
long_description:
Frigade AI is an in-app assistant that intelligently guides and onboards your users through your product. Our agent learns your product's interface, gives contextual guidance that adapts to each user, and takes actions directly on your users' behalf.

Learn more at Frigade.com
one_liner: AI-powered product assistance for modern software teams

name: Ariglad
long_description:
Founded in Vancouver, British Columbia, Ariglad The first AI platform that integrates with support channels and release notes to auto-maintain your knowledge base. Ariglad suggests new articles, updates existing ones, detects duplicates, and merges them. Basically, it puts your knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot.

This is led by Co-Founders Sophie and Ali. They are both completely obsessed with this problem and their customers, who have partnered with Ariglad to become immensely more efficient.
one_liner: Knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot

name: Pillar
long_description: Your help center shouldn't be an afterthought. Pillar keeps yours alive and accurate, letting users self-help with trusted answers embedded right where they need them.
one_liner: The Intelligent Help Center

name: Open
long_description:
Open is an AI-powered, all-in-one customer support and communication platform — used in production by:

Print.com, Mollie.com, Viva.com, More.com, Orderchamp.com, OneCarNow.com, and other major enterprise companies.

We specialize in solving and automating complex support cases across email, web, phone, SMS, and WhatsApp.

We’re a research-based company currently working on releasing Support-Bench, the world’s most comprehensive AI customer support benchmark.

Our team consists of +3 programming language builders, a nationwide cybersecurity competition winner at age 16, and a dentist.
one_liner: Enterprise AI customer support

name: Conduit
long_description:
Conduit is the AI agent platform that drives conversational outcomes across support and sales.

Customer conversations are the backbone of every business. Consumer businesses spend nearly a third of their working hours calling and texting customers. Conduit turns those conversations into an engine for conversions, revenue, and cost savings. 

We enable operators across real estate, financials, and service-based businesses, to build and deploy AI agents that perform better than your best employee. Our modular platform enables automation for the most complex, high-volume conversational workflows.
one_liner: Conversational AI agents for Customer Service.

name: Rulebase
long_description: Rulebase builds AI coworkers that help banks and fintechs review 100% of customer interactions in real time. Our agents flag compliance breaches, high-risk issues, and quality gaps across calls, chats, and emails — then route them to the right teammates. The result: up to 30% fewer escalations and QA cycles reduced from hours to minutes.
one_liner: AI agents for financial services.

name: Calltree
long_description: Calltree makes enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers. Our AI reps take voice calls and chats like other AI support agents but can also use internal enterprise tools like a homegrown CRM or internal dashboards, like the highly trained humans working there today.
one_liner: Enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers

name: Lance
long_description: Lance is an AI voice agent for hotel operations that owns guest communication end-to-end and orchestrates complex actions across the hospitality tech stack. Trusted by hotel groups with 50+ hotels across Marriott, Hyatt, and Hilton.
one_liner: AI Agents built for Hospitality

name: Patientdesk.ai
long_description: The universal AI front desk for healthcare: plugs into any practice management system (cloud-based or on-premise) and automates all patient workflows: scheduling, cancellations, payment plans, insurance checks, reminders, intake, and follow-ups.
one_liner: AI voice agent for patient calls & admin workflows
